item.title: Guildwars 2
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:21, topic:459424”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=562329.msg4105950#msg4105950 date=1347987576]

You’re still comparing it to other games too easily.
[/quote]Umm… the entire fucking review is comparing it to WoW and saying why its so much better?

Yes, as in how it did everything different than the traditional wow clone crap[/quote]Yes, and that’s why it’s biased. He isn’t just informing people of the changes, he’s forcing his view on you that because he doesn’t like some of the clonish things, you shouldn’t either. It’s his OPINION that backtracking is lame, it’s his OPINION that having abilities bound to weapons is better, but he talks about it like it’s a fact everyone should believe. I’m not saying that everything he says I disagree with, I just hate the way he presents it. He doesn’t even talk about what most reviews talk about, which is how well done the game is or how complete/fun to play it is, he just goes on and on comparing it to WoW. I think it’s an absolute piece of worthless garbage review.

Read full topic

I really liked how he claimed GWII gave us so much customization because of weapons. Hasn’t WoW more skills to use and therefore even more customisation?[/quote]
Wows skills arent as custom as GW2, you just have more.

item.title: Guildwars 2
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:14, topic:459424”]For those who havent played

This review is better than IGN/Gamespots because he goes over everything thats better and changed

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ax-_06Acj8Y[/quote]Most biased piece of garbage I’ve ever watched, besides politician commercials. I’ve seen people play GW2 before, the questing system is not anything as amazing as he says. And he twists a lot of the crap around to make it sound like a good thing, like abilities being bound to weapons. I don’t see how that’s a good thing at all, I like having all of my abilities be available to me when I want them, not being limited to 4 or whatever. Lowers the skillcap a lot. Really the only things good about GW2 (gameplay wise) in my opinion that I am interested in are the more dynamic world events and WvWPvP. Personally I couldn’t give two shits about PvP, so the lack of endgame content for this is what turns me off.

Read full topic

item.description:
@iCreatedHorror wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:12, topic:459424”]Yea I love wvw[/quote]It varies for me; everyone I WvW with is taking a break after the last couple of days of near non-stop WvW against HoD. We’re pretty much sick of them and the fact that they exploit to win and that ANet hasn’t patched the glitch (not confirmed after latest patch, have to wait and see).

Also, I added you in game, so I’ll show under followers (such a weird idea, in my opinion).

item.title: Guildwars 2
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

From what I hear GW2 is fun to level, but the end game content is complete shite

It’s more PvP oriented end-game, which isn’t really my style.

Also when you said on sale I assumed a discount, in which case I might have bought it, but yea I don’t wanna pay 60 dollars for a game I’m not sure I’ll enjoy

Read full topic

item.title: Guildwars 2
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Well I loved WoW until I realized MOP was just going to be the same shit.

It was either I pay $55 for MOP and another month or I pay $60 and try gw2

Loved it and never went back

Read full topic
